Camden.Fabric Row (Philadelphia):
Fabric Row ("Der Ferder" in Yiddish) is a historic Jewish textile and garment district located on South 4th Street in the city of Philadelphia between Bainbridge Street and Catherine Street.


== Demographics ==

In 2016, Fabric Row, a neighborhood statistic which also includes 3rd and 4th Streets, had a population of 175 in an area of 0.004 square miles, giving a population density of 40,972 per square mile. The median household income is $93,750.
